body: I think this is probably fixed in [the latest beta](https://beta.rclone.org) can you try that?
Thank you for your feedback, I will try that and keep you updated üëç
looks like it is not fixed in the latest beta :(

Using this version:
```
rclone v1.37-117-g58f7b4ed\ufffd\ufffd
- os/arch: linux/amd64
- go version: go1.9
```
tried to use `move` from `amazon drive` to `dropbox`, but doesn't work either

I can confirm that this is a problem, empty directories on the source aren't deleted after a move.

```
$ mkdir issue-1642
$ touch issue-1642/dir
$ rm issue-1642/dir
$ mkdir issue-1642/dir
$ touch issue-1642/dir/file.txt
$ rclone -vv move issue-1642 dropbox:issue-1642
2017/09/07 10:11:54 DEBUG : rclone: Version "v1.37-121-gfe536f3f" starting with parameters ["rclone" "-vv" "move" "issue-1642" "dropbox:issue-1642"]
2017/09/07 10:11:54 INFO  : Dropbox root 'issue-1642': Modify window is 1s
2017/09/07 10:11:55 INFO  : Dropbox root 'issue-1642': Waiting for checks to finish
2017/09/07 10:11:55 INFO  : Dropbox root 'issue-1642': Waiting for transfers to finish
2017/09/07 10:11:56 INFO  : dir/file.txt: Copied (new)
2017/09/07 10:11:56 INFO  : dir/file.txt: Deleted
2017/09/07 10:11:56 INFO  : 
Transferred:      0 Bytes (0 Bytes/s)
Errors:                 0
Checks:                 1
Transferred:            1
Elapsed time:        2.8s

2017/09/07 10:11:56 DEBUG : Go routines at exit 7
2017/09/07 10:11:56 DEBUG : rclone: Version "v1.37-121-gfe536f3f" finishing with parameters ["rclone" "-vv" "move" "issue-1642" "dropbox:issue-1642"]
$ tree issue-1642/
issue-1642/
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ dir

0 directories, 0 files
```
This has been an issue for a long time. Same issue with `rclone copy`. Why are new releases being made without such a critical thing being fixed? The program is hardly usable the way it is...
rclone is definitely usable for me. All about use cases.

issue.title: Manage folders

repository.name: rclone
repository.description: "rsync for cloud storage" - Google Drive, S3, Dropbox, Backblaze B2, One Drive, Swift, Hubic, Wasabi, Google Cloud Storage, Azure Blob, Azure Files, Yandex Files

issue.body:
Some of rclones remote fs do understand the concept of folders, eg
- drive
- local
- dropbox

Make an optional interfaces (eg `Mkdir`, `Rmdir`) for these FS to manage the creation and deletion of folders.  This would enable empty folders, and deletion of empty folders on sync.

body: I'm taking this up, if it's not a problem @ncw
@ishuah ready to test as soon as the feature is ready. :)
Please find a beta with the fix in: https://beta.rclone.org/v1.38-093-gc65734ee/ (uploaded in 15-30 mins)
